post.text: Amazing photos from San Jose rally, on the rope line. I love my supporters (#TrumpTrain) and appreciate your support! Thank you!

comment.author: Noha
comment.text: Using a fake photo of an African American family, lying & saying they're supporting him, was pathetic! Bribery claims, not surprised! If you can write a playbook & target to scam the elderly via Trump university, you're certainly capable! If the GOP, had Vetted Trump they wouldn't be dying of shame & embarrassment right now!
